Header: Poya day party ends in murder
Content: One person was killed following an argument between two persons during a party in Makuluwa, Galle last night (Mar. 01). Police said that the victim had been attacked with a sharp object and he had died upon admission to Karapitiya Teaching Hospital. The victim was a 38-year-old, resident of Makuluwa, Galle. The suspect had fled the area following the incident.
